1573054.effect: If you control "Entropy King Morte", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can reveal 1 "Entropy Beast" monster in your hand; Special Summon 1 "Entropy King Morte" from your Extra Deck, then attach this card and the revealed card to that monster as Xyz materials. If this card is detached from an Xyz monster and sent to the GY: Special Summon it. You can target 1 card in your GY, or 1 card in your opponent's GY if they have more cards in their GY than you; attach that card to 1 "Entropy King Morte" you control as Xyz material. You can only use each effect of "Entropy Beast Sangue" once per turn.
1573054.name: Entropy Beast Sangue

1573062.effect: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by sending 1 card you control to the GY. You can reveal 1 "Entropy Beast" monster in your hand; Special Summon 1 "Entropy King Morte" from your Extra Deck, then attach this card and the revealed card to that monster as Xyz materials. If this card is detached from an Xyz monster and sent to the GY: Special Summon it. You can target 1 Spell/Trap you control, or 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls if they control more Spell/Traps than you; attach that card to 1 "Entropy King Morte" you control as Xyz material. You can only use each effect of "Entropy Beast Rovina" once per turn.
1573062.name: Entropy Beast Rovina

1573065.effect: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by sending 1 card from your hand to the GY. You can reveal 1 "Entropy Beast" monster in your hand; Special Summon 1 "Entropy King Morte" from your Extra Deck, then attach this card and the revealed card to that monster as Xyz materials. If this card is detached from an Xyz monster and sent to the GY: Special Summon it. During your Main Phase: You can attach 1 card in your hand to 1 "Entropy King Morte" you control as Xyz material, or if your opponent has more total cards in their hand and field than you do, you can have your opponent attach 1 card from their hand instead. You can only use each effect of "Entropy Beast Ferita" once per turn.
1573065.name: Entropy Beast Ferita

1573058.effect: If you control an "Entropy Beast" monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). Cannot attack unless you control "Entropy King Morte". You can reveal 1 "Entropy Beast" monster in your hand; Special Summon 1 "Entropy King Morte" from your Extra Deck, then attach this card and the revealed card to that monster as Xyz materials. If this card is detached from an Xyz monster and sent to the GY: Special Summon it. During your Main Phase: You can attach 1 monster from your Extra Deck to 1 "Entropy King Morte" you control as Xyz material, or if your opponent has more monsters in their Extra Deck than you, you can look at your opponent's Extra Deck and attach 1 monster from there instead. You can only use each effect of "Entropy Beast Guerra" once per turn.
1573058.name: Entropy Beast Guerra

1573046.effect: If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can reveal 1 "Entropy Beast" monster in your hand; Special Summon 1 "Entropy King Morte" from your Extra Deck, then attach this card and the revealed card to that monster as Xyz materials. If this card is detached from an Xyz monster and sent to the GY: Special Summon it. You can target 1 monster you control, or 1 monster your opponent controls if they control more Special Summoned monsters than your monsters Summoned from the Extra Deck; attach that monster to 1 "Entropy King Morte" you control as Xyz material. You can only use each effect of "Entropy Beast Marcire" once per turn.
1573046.name: Entropy Beast Marcire

1588432.effect: During your Main Phase: You can attach this card from your hand or GY to 1 "Entropy King Morte" you control as Xyz material, also if it was attached from the GY, banish it when it's detached to activate that monster's effect. When this card is detached from an Xyz monster: add 1 "Entropy Beast" or "Entropy King" card from your Deck to your hand. You can banish this card from your GY; Return all "Entropy King Morte" from your GY to your Extra Deck. You can only use each effect of "Entropy Servant Schiavo" once per turn.
1588432.name: Entropy Servant Schiavo

1573103.effect: During the Standby Phase: You can target 1 "Entropy Beast" monster you control; This turn, that monster can activate its effect on the field as a Quick Effect. You can shuffle 1 card from your hand into your Deck; add 1 "Entropy Beast" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Preparations for the Entropy King" once per turn.
1573103.name: Preparations for the Entropy King

1573107.effect: When a monster on the field activates its effect, or when a Spell/Trap that is already face-up on the field activates its effect: You can attach that card to 1 "Entropy King Morte" you control as Xyz material. If an "Entropy Beast" monster you control is destroyed: You can add 1 "Entropy Beast" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Discovery of the Entropy King" once per turn.
1573107.name: Discovery of the Entropy King

1573072.effect:
(This card's original Rank is always treated as 10.)
Cannot be Xyz Summoned. You can detach 1 material from this card (Quick Effect); this card gains 1000 ATK/DEF, then you can apply the following effect(s) depending on what was detached. (but you cannot apply the same effect again this turn).
● An "Entropy Beast" card: During this turn, negate all card effects that target this card.
● A card you own that is not an "Entropy Beast" card: Draw 1 card.
● A card owned by your opponent: Destroy 1 card on the field.
1573072.name: Entropy King Morte

1738724.effect: This card's original ATK/DEF is halved. At the start of the Battle Phase: You can target 1 face-up card you control and 1 face-up card your opponent controls; negate their effects until the end of this turn.
1738724.name: Quincyl, Coats of All

1732263.effect:
(This card's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Psychic.)
When this card is Normal Summoned: You can take 1 non-WIND "Shiki-no-Kami" monster from your Deck, and either to your hand, or, if you control a Token, you can Special Summon that monster instead. You can only use this effect of "Shiki-no-Kami Noroi" once per turn.
1732263.name: Shiki-no-Kami Noroi

1738049.effect: When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can gain 500 LP. You can use this effect of "Wryne the Wind Speaker" up to twice per turn. If this attacking card battles an opponent's monster, at the start of the Damage Step: Banish that opponent's monster face-up. You must have at least 12000 LP to activate and resolve this effect.
1738049.name: Wryne the Wind Speaker

1738072.effect: You can reveal this card and 2 other Sea Serpent monsters in your hand; your opponent chooses 1 for you to Special Summon, and you choose another to send to the GY. If this card is Special Summoned while you control another WATER monster, and while all monsters you control are Sea Serpent monsters (min. 2): You can draw 2 cards. You can only use each effect of "Father Octopoda" once per turn.
1738072.name: Father Octopoda

1738691.effect:
Banish the top card of your Deck. If "Dual Diamond, Rojo" is in your GY, you can instead place this card in your left Pendulum Zone as a card with a Pendulum Scale of 1 with the following effect. You can only activate 1 "Dual Diamond, Azul" per turn.
●Once per turn: You can send 1 Spell/Trap you control to the GY, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it.
1738691.name: Dual Diamond, Azul

1738688.effect:
Send the top card of your Deck to the GY. If "Dual Diamond, Azul" is in your GY, you can instead place this card in your right Pendulum Zone as a card with a Pendulum Scale of 8 with the following effect. You can only activate 1 "Dual Diamond, Rojo" per turn.
●Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 monster, then target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy it.
1738688.name: Dual Diamond, Rojo

1738031.effect: Return 1 monster you control to the hand, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Pidgeon Token" (WIND/Winged Beast/Level 2/ATK 900/DEF 700), but for the rest of this turn, you cannot activate monster effects. You can only activate 1 "Ta-Daaa!" per turn.
1738031.name: Ta-Daaa!

1738022.effect: You can only control 1 "Watching Life Go By". When this card is activated: You can add 1 Level 4 or lower Dragon monster from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, discard 1 card. You cannot Special Summon Level 5 or higher Dragon monsters the turn you activate this effect. While you control 3 or more Dragon monsters, all monsters you control gain 300 ATK/DEF.
1738022.name: Watching Life Go By

1738750.effect: During the Main Phase: Shuffle up to 10 cards from your GY into the Deck (min. 3), and if you do, inflict 200 damage to your opponent for each. If you shuffled 10 cards into the Deck this way, gain 2000 LP. At the start of the Main Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was activated and resolved successfully: You can banish this card from your GY; draw 2 cards. You can only activate 1 "Great Escape" per turn.
1738750.name: Great Escape

1737992.effect:
2 Yokai monsters
(This card's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Beast.)
If this card is Special Summoned: You can reveal 3 Yokai monsters from your face-down Extra Deck; Special Summon 1 Yokai monster from your GY, and if you do, your opponent chooses 1 of the revealed monsters to Special Summon to their field. You can only Special Summon "Spritzy Spring Fox(es)" once per turn.
1737992.name: Spritzy Spring Fox

1853479.effect: You can discard this card, then reveal 1 other "Eviction" monster in your hand; send 1 "Eviction" monster from your Deck to the GY, except "Deep in Eviction". During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Deep in Eviction" once per turn.
1853479.name: Deep in Eviction

1853458.effect: 2+ "Eviction" monstersIf this card is Link Summoned: You can draw 1 card. When a card or effect is activated that targets a DARK "Eviction" monster you control (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 Fairy monster from your GY; negate the activation, and if you do, this card gains 500 ATK. You can only use each effect of "Traitors of Eviction" once per turn.
1853458.name: Traitors of Eviction

1078438.effect: If this card is Special Summoned, while you control no other DARK monsters: You can add 1 "Cyberchrome" card that is banished or in your GY to your hand, except a DARK monster, then, if you have 5 banished "Cyberchrome" monsters with different Attributes, you can banish 1 other card from your hand. During your Main Phase: You can shuffle this banished card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 Level 4 non-DARK "Cyberchrome" monster from your Deck, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except "Cyberchrome" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Evil Cyberchrome - Violetta" once per turn.
1078438.name: Evil Cyberchrome - Violetta

1078426.effect: If this card is Special Summoned, while you control no other FIRE monsters: You can banish 1 card from your hand, and if you do, draw 1 card, or, if you have 5 banished "Cyberchrome" monsters with different Attributes, each player banishes 1 card from their hand instead. During your Main Phase: You can shuffle this banished card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 Level 4 non-FIRE "Cyberchrome" monster from your Deck, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except "Cyberchrome" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Cyberchrome League - Ruby" once per turn.
1078426.name: Cyberchrome League - Ruby

1080363.effect: If this card is Special Summoned, while you control no other FIRE monsters: You can target 1 monster in your opponent's GY; banish it, or, if you have 5 banished "Cyberchrome" monsters with different Attributes, you can Special Summon that monster to your field instead, but its effects are negated, also it becomes a Cyberse monster. During your Main Phase: You can shuffle this card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 Level 4 non-FIRE "Cyberchrome" monster from your Deck, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except "Cyberchrome" monsters. You can only use each effect of "A.I. Cyberchrome "Phoenix" - Clementine" once per turn.
1080363.name: A.I. Cyberchrome "Phoenix" - Clementine

1078408.effect: If this card is Special Summoned, while you control no other LIGHT monsters: You can Set 1 "Cyberchrome" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck, then if you have 5 banished "Cyberchrome" monsters with different Attributes, it can be activated this turn. During your Main Phase: You can shuffle this banished card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 Level 4 non-LIGHT "Cyberchrome" monster from your Deck, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except "Cyberchrome" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Cyberchrome League - Amber" once per turn.
1078408.name: Cyberchrome League - Amber

1078363.effect: If this card is Special Summoned, while you control no other WATER monsters: You can add 1 non-WATER "Cyberchrome" monster from your Deck to your hand, or, if you have 5 banished "Cyberchrome" monsters with different Attributes, you can Special Summon it instead. During your Main Phase: You can shuffle this banished card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 Level 4 non-WATER "Cyberchrome" monster from your Deck, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except "Cyberchrome" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Evil Cyberchrome - Turquoise" once per turn.
1078363.name: Evil Cyberchrome - Turquoise

1078461.effect: If this card is Special Summoned, while you control no other WIND monsters: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 "Cyberchrome" monster that is banished or in your GY, except a WIND monster, then, if you have 5 banished "Cyberchrome" monsters with different Attributes, you can Special Summon 1 "Chrome Token" (Cyberse/WIND/Level 4/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position. During your Main Phase: You can shuffle this banished card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 Level 4 non-WIND "Cyberchrome" monster from your Deck, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except "Cyberchrome" monsters. You can only use each effect of "A.I. Cyberchrome "Maid" - Jadina" once per turn.
1078461.name: A.I. Cyberchrome "Maid" - Jadina

1078479.effect: If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Cyberchrome" monster, while you control no other FIRE monsters: You can banish 1 card from your GY, then target 1 other Special Summoned monster on the field; banish it, then, if you have 5 banished "Cyberchrome" monsters with different Attributes, you can banish 1 Set Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field. During yu Main Phase: You can shuffle this banished card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 Level 8 non-FIRE "Cyberchrome" monster from your Deck, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except "Cyberchrome" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Evil Cyberchrome - Scarlet" once per turn.
1078479.name: Evil Cyberchrome - Scarlet

1078467.effect: If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Cyberchrome" monster, while you control no other WIND monsters: Inflict 100 damage to your opponent for each Special Summoned monster on the field, then, if you have 5 banished "Cyberchrome" monsters with different Attributes, all monsters your opponent controls lose ATK equal to the amount of damage they took. During your Main Phase: You can shuffle this banished card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 Level 8 non-WIND "Cyberchrome" monster from your Deck, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except "Cyberchrome" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Cyberchrome League - Anis" once per turn.
1078467.name: Cyberchrome League - Anis

1295375.effect: If you have no monsters in your GY: Add 1 "Cyberchrome" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Cyberchrome League - Gathering", then, if you have 5 banished "Cyberchrome" monsters with different Attributes, you can draw 1 card. You can only activate 1 "Cyberchrome League - Gathering" per turn.
1295375.name: Cyberchrome League - Gathering

1082794.effect: If you have no monsters in your GY: Banish 1 Level 4 "Cyberchrome" monster from your Deck, or, if you have 5 banished "Cyberchrome" monsters with different Attributes, you can Special Summon it instead. You can only activate 1 "Cyberchrome League - Emergency Call" per turn.
1082794.name: Cyberchrome League - Emergency Call

1092183.effect: Any "Cyberchrome" monster sent to the GY is banished instead. You can banish this card and 1 other card on your field, then target up to 2 of your banished Level 4 "Cyberchrome" monsters with different Attributes from monsters you control; Special Summon them, but their effects are negated, also you cannot Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Cyberchrome" monsters. You must have no monsters in your GY to activate and to resolve this effect. You can only use this effect of "A.I. Cyberchrome - Matrix" effect once per turn.
1092183.name: A.I. Cyberchrome - Matrix

1082790.effect: You can banish 1 "Cyberchrome" monster from your hand, and if you do, draw 1 card, then, if you drew a "Cyberchrome" monster by this effect, you can banish that monster, and if you do that, draw 1 card. You must have no monsters in your GY to activate and to resolve this effect. You can only use this effect of "Cyberchrome League - Circle" once per turn.
1082790.name: Cyberchrome League - Circle

1081172.effect: "Cyberchrome" monsters you control gain 100 ATK/DEF for each banished "Cyberchrome" monsters with different Attributes. When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Cyberchrome" monster from your Deck to your hand, then, if you have 5 banished "Cyberchrome" monsters with different Attributes, this turn, you can Normal Summon 1 "Cyberchrome" monster, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) You must have no monsters in your GY to activate and to resolve this effect. You can only activate 1 "A.I. Cyberchrome - Simulation" per turn.
1081172.name: A.I. Cyberchrome - Simulation

1083116.effect: When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card, while you control a "Cyberchrome" monster and have no monsters in your GY: Negate the activation, and if you do, banish that card, then, if you have 5 banished "Cyberchrome" monsters with different Attributes, you can banish 1 monster on the field. You can only activate 1 "Cyberchrome League - Recoding" per turn.
1083116.name: Cyberchrome League - Recoding

1410673.effect: When an opponent's monster declares an attack, while you control a "Cyberchrome" monster and have no monsters in your GY: Target the attacking monster; banish it, then, if you have 5 banished "Cyberchrome" monsters with different Attributes, you can banish 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field. You can only activate 1 "Cyberchrome League - Ambush" per turn.
1410673.name: Cyberchrome League - Ambush

1078517.effect: 2 Cyberse monsters with different Attributes, including a "Cyberchrome" monsterMust first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by banishing the above cards you control. (You do not use "Polymerization".) If this card is Special Summoned: You can activate this effect; your opponent cannot negate the activation of your "Cyberchrome" cards and effects until the end of this turn. All "Cyberchrome" monsters gain 100 ATK/DEF for each "Cyberchrome" monsters with different Attributes on the field. Once per turn: You can banish 1 "Cyberchrome" monster from your hand; banish 1 other "Cyberchrome" monster from your Deck with the same Level, but a different Attribute. If this card would leave the field, banish it instead. You can only Special Summon "Cyberchrome League - Malvina" once per turn.
1078517.name: Cyberchrome League - Malvina

1078533.effect: 1 "A.I. Cyberchrome" Tuner + 1 non-Tuner Cyberse monsterWhen a card or effect is activated that would add a card from the Main Deck to the hand OR Special Summon a monster(s) (Quick Effect): You can banish this card; negate the activation. During the next Standby Phase, if this card's preceding effect was activated this turn (and was not negated): You can Special Summon this banished card. If this card would leave the field, banish it instead. You can only Special Summon "Cyberchrome League - Bianca" once per turn.
1078533.name: Cyberchrome League - Bianca

1078697.effect: 2+ Level 4 "Cyberchrome" monsters with different AttributesYou can also Xyz Summon this card by using 1 Level 8 "Cyberchrome" monster you control as material. This card is treated as not having an Attribute while face-up on the field. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 Level 4 "Cyberchrome" monster that is banished or in the GY; apply that target's first effect, then shuffle it into the Deck. If this card would be leave the field, banish it instead. You can only Special Summon "Evil Cyberchrome - Neyrelle" once per turn.
1078697.name: Evil Cyberchrome - Neyrelle

1080978.effect: 1 non-Link "Cyberchrome" monsterIf this card is Link Summoned: You can shuffle the monster used for the Link Summon of this card into the Deck; add 1 "A.I. Cyberchrome" Spell/Trap Card from your Deck to your hand. You can banish 1 "Cyberchrome" monster you control; Special Summon 1 level 4 "Cyberchrome" monster from your Deck in Defense Position, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except "Cyberchrome" monsters. You can only use each effect of "A.I. Cyberchrome "Butterfly" - Azur" once per turn.
1080978.name: A.I. Cyberchrome "Butterfly" - Azur

1078776.effect: 2+ Cyberse monsters, including a "Cyberchrome" monsterThis card can attack all Special Summoned monsters your opponent controls once each. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. Banish all monsters destroyed by battle with this card. If this card would be leave the field, banish it instead. You can only Special Summon "Cyberchrome League - Marine" once per turn.
1078776.name: Cyberchrome League - Marine

1839909.effect: If this card its Summoned: You can add 1 "Cosmic Primal" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Cosmic Primal - The Creation" once per turn. Once per turn, if this card its Pendulum Summoned: You can target 1 "Cosmic Primal" card in your Pendulum Zone; increase that target's Pendulum Scale by 1.
1839909.name: Cosmic Primal - The Creation
1839909.pendulum_effect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Cosmic Primal" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. If this card Pendulum Scale its 2 or more: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it, and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Cosmic Primal - The Creation" once per turn.

1840170.effect: If this card its Summoned: You can draw 1 card, and if you do, reveal it; if the revealed card its a monster you can draw antoher card, if not, your opponent draws 1 card. Once per turn, if this card its Pendulum Summoned: You can target 1 "Cosmic Primal" card in your Pendulum Zone; increase that target's Pendulum Scale by 1.
1840170.name: Cosmic Primal - The Desire
1840170.pendulum_effect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Cosmic Primal" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. If this card Pendulum Scale its 2 or more: You can target 1 "Cosmic Primal" Spell or Trap card in your GY, then shuffle that target into the deck; apply that card effect to this card. You can only use this effect of "Cosmic Primal - The Desire" once per turn.

1840130.effect: If this card its Summoned: You can target 1 "Cosmic Primal" monster you control and 1 monster your opponent controls; switch control of those monsters. Once per turn, if this card its Pendulum Summoned: You can target 1 "Cosmic Primal" card in your Pendulum Zone; increase that target's Pendulum Scale by 2.
1840130.name: Cosmic Primal - The Judgement

1839992.effect: If this card its Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Cosmic Primal" monster from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Cosmic Primal - The Knowledge" once per turn. Once per turn, if this card its Pendulum Summoned: You can target 1 "Cosmic Primal" card in your Pendulum Zone; increase that target's Pendulum Scale by 2.
1839992.name: Cosmic Primal - The Knowledge
1839992.pendulum_effect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Cosmic Primal" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. If this card Pendulum Scale its 6 or more: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower "Cosmic Primal" monser in your Extra Deck face-up, or in your GY; add it to your hand, or Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Cosmic Primal - The Knowledge" once per turn.

1840018.effect: If this card its Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Cosmic Primal" monster from your Extra Deck face-up or your GY. Once per turn, if this card its Pendulum Summoned: You can target 1 "Cosmic Primal" card in your Pendulum Zone; increase that target's Pendulum Scale by 2.
1840018.name: Cosmic Primal - The Paradox
1840018.pendulum_effect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Cosmic Primal" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. If this card Pendulum Scale its 6 or more: You can add 1 "Cosmic Primal" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Cosmic Primal - The Paradox" once per turn.

1839931.effect: "The primal incarnation of the power, the ultimate exponent of the strength and the will."
1839931.name: Cosmic Primal - The Power
1839931.pendulum_effect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Cosmic Primal" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. If this card Pendulum Scale its 6 or more: You can target 1 "Cosmic Primal" monster on the field; that targets gains ATK/DEF equal to this card's Pendulum Scale x300 until the end of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Cosmic Primal - The Power" once per turn.

1840041.effect: If this card its Summoned: You can gain LP equal to the number of face-up "Cosmic Primal" card you control x300, or inflict damage to your opponent for each face-up "Cosmic Primal" card x200. You can only use this effect of "Cosmic Primal - The Vitality" once per turn. Once per turn, if this card its Pendulum Summoned: You can target 1 "Cosmic Primal" card in your Pendulum Zone; increase that target's Pendulum Scale by 1.
1840041.name: Cosmic Primal - The Vitality

1839915.effect: "The pure manifestation of the abyss, the representation of the darkest depths in the cosmos."
1839915.name: Cosmic Primal - The Void
1839915.pendulum_effect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Cosmic Primal" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. If this card Pendulum Scale its 6 or more: You can target 1 "Cosmic Primal" card that its banished, in your GY, or in your Extra Deck face-up; add it to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Cosmic Primal - The Void" once per turn.

1840050.effect: If this card its Summoned: You can add 1 "Cosmic Primal" card from your Deck to your hand, but for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot add cards from your Deck to your hand by any card effect. Once per turn, if this card its Pendulum Summoned: You can target 1 "Cosmic Primal" card in your Pendulum Zone; increase that target's Pendulum Scale by 1.
1840050.name: Cosmic Primal - The Wisdom
1840050.pendulum_effect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Cosmic Primal" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. If you control no monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your Pendulum Zone, but for the rest of this turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Cosmic Primal" monsters. You can only use this effect of "Cosmic Primal - The Wisdom" once per turn.

1840232.effect: While this card is face up on the field, Pendulum Scales of each of your "Cosmic Primal" cards in your Pendulum Zones are increased by 1. If this card is destroyed or a face-up "Cosmic Primal" card you control is destroyed: You can add 1 "Cosmic Primal" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Cosmic Primal - Cosmos" once per turn.
1840232.name: Cosmic Primal - Cosmos

1840278.effect: Until the end of this turn you can treat each monster zone on your side of the field as pointed by a Link Monster for the Pendulum Summon of "Cosmic Primal" monsters, also you cannot summon any monsters, except by Pendulum Summon or by Fusion Summon. If this card its in your GY: You can target 1 "Cosmic Primal" card in your Pendulum Zone, then decrease that target's Pendulum Scale by 2; add this card to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Cosmic Primal - Exodus" once per turn.
1840278.name: Cosmic Primal - Exodus

1840179.effect: You can target 1 "Cosmic Primal" card in your Pendulum Zone; decrease that target's Pendulum Scale by 4, then Special Summon 1 "Cosmic Primal" from your Deck or hand. (If you cannot reduce that card's Pendulum Scale, you have to destroy that card instead.) You can only activate 1 "Cosmic Primal - The Space Realm" per turn.
1840179.name: Cosmic Primal - The Space Realm

1840176.effect: You can target 1 "Cosmic Primal" card in your Pendulum Zone; decrease that target's Pendulum Scale by 2, then draw 1 card. (If you cannot reduce that card's Pendulum Scale, you have to destroy that card instead.) You can only activate 1 "Cosmic Primal - The Time Realm" per turn.
1840176.name: Cosmic Primal - The Time Realm

1840184.effect: You can send 1 "Cosmic Primal" monster from your Deck to the GY or to your Extra Deck face-up, or, if you control a face-up "Cosmic Primal" card in your Pendulum Zone whose Pendulum Scale is 6 or more, you can Special Summon 1 "Cosmic Primal" monster from your GY or Extra Deck face-up instead. You can only activate 1 "Cosmic Primal - The Void Realm" per turn.
1840184.name: Cosmic Primal - The Void Realm

10654.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 Fairy monster from your Deck or Extra Deck to the GY, and if you do, increase this card's Level by the Level of the sent monster, until the end of this turn. If this card is Tributed: You can Special Summon 1 Level 2 or lower Fairy monster from your hand or Deck, except "Diviner of the Heralds". You can only use each effect of "Diviner of the Heralds" once per turn.
10654.name: Diviner of the Heralds

226.effect: If you have exactly 4 Fairy monsters in your GY, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If Summoned this way: Target 1 Fairy monster in your GY; add that target to your hand. Neither player can Special Summon monsters. If this face-up card would be sent from the field to the GY, place it on top of the Deck, instead.
226.name: Archlord Kristya

8381.effect: Send 1 Spell/Trap from your Deck to the GY. You can only activate 1 "Foolish Burial Goods" per turn.
8381.name: Foolish Burial Goods

4098.effect: Add 1 Level 5 or higher Normal Monster from your Deck to your hand.
4098.name: Summoner's Art

1840310.effect: 3 "Cosmic Primal" monstersThis card can be Special Summoned from your Extra Deck by Tributing the above cards you control (This is treated as a Fusion Summon.). If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can target cards on the field up to the number of face-up "Cosmic Primal" cards you control -2; destroy them. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Cosmic Primal" card in your Pendulum Zone with a Pendulum Scale of 2 or more, then decrease that target's Pendulum Scale to 0; this card cannot be destroyed or banished by card effects until the end of this turn. (Quick Effect) You can banish 1 "Cosmic Primal" monster from your hand, field or GY; this card gains attack equal to the original ATK/DEF of that banished monster until the end of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Cosmic Primal - Genesis" once per turn.
1840310.name: Cosmic Primal - Genesis

1840359.effect: 1 "Cosmic Primal" monsterYou can discard 1 "Cosmic Primal" card from your hand; add 1 "Cosmic Primal" Spell/Trap card from your Deck to your hand. You can tribute 1 Fairy-Type monster this card points to; add 1 Fairy-Type monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Cosmic Primal - The Charity" once per turn.
1840359.name: Cosmic Primal - The Charity

1807183.effect:
FLIP: You can add 1 "Submerzan" monster from your Deck to your hand.
You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) in face-down Defense Position. If your opponent targets this card for an attack or an effect while it is facedown: Change it to Attack Position, then if it was targeted by an effect, you can negate that effect. Once per turn: You can change this card to face-down Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Akularks of the Submerzans" per turn.
1807183.name: Akularks of the Submerzans

1807184.effect:
FLIP: You can add 1 "Submerzan" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.
You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) in face-down Defense Position. If your opponent targets this card for an attack or an effect while it is facedown: Change it to Attack Position, then if it was targeted by an effect, you can banish 1 card from your opponent's GY. Once per turn: You can change this card to face-down Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Mynoctos of the Submerzans" per turn.
1807184.name: Mynoctos of the Submerzans

1807131.effect:
FLIP: You can add 1 "Submerzan" card from your GY to your hand.
You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) in face-down Defense Position. If your opponent targets this card for an attack or an effect while it is facedown: Change it to Attack Position, then if it was targeted by an effect, you can draw 1 card. Once per turn: You can change this card to face-down Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Omarabs of the Submerzans" per turn.
1807131.name: Omarabs of the Submerzans

1807150.effect:
FLIP: You can Special Summon 1 "Submerzan" monster from your GY in face-down Defense Position.
You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) in face-down Defense Position. If your opponent targets this card for an attack or an effect while it is facedown: Change it to Attack Position, then if it was targeted by an effect, you can destroy 1 card on the field. Once per turn: You can change this card to face-down Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Vuhoreels of the Submerzans" per turn.
1807150.name: Vuhoreels of the Submerzans

1814816.effect:
FLIP: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; move it to an adjacent unoccupied Zone, then negate the effects of all cards your opponent controls in that column until the end of this turn.
Cannot be Summoned. When your opponent activates a card or effect in this card's column while it is facedown (Quick Effect): You can change this card to Attack Position. Once per turn: You can change this card to face-down Defense Position.
1814816.name: Cheretle, Ruler of the Submerzans

1807122.effect:
FLIP: You can activate 1 of the following effects.
● You can target 1 card in your opponent's Main Monster Zone; reveal it if it was Set, also place it into the opponent's unoccupied Spell & Trap Zone in that same column as a Continuous Spell with the following effect: "Once per turn: You can send this card to the GY, draw 1 card, then shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck."
● You can target 1 card in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone; reveal it if it was Set, also Special Summon it in Attack Position as a Normal Monster into your opponent's unoccupied Main Monster Zone in that same column (Sea Serpent/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). (That card is NOT treated as a Spell or Trap.)
Cannot be Summoned. When your opponent activates a card or effect in this card's column while it is facedown (Quick Effect): You can change this card to Attack Position. Once per turn: You can change this card to face-down Defense Position.
1807122.name: Kythale, God-King of the Submerzans

1807142.effect: Once per turn, you can have your opponent take all battle damage you would take from a battle involving a "Submerzan" monster. During your Main Phase: You can change 1 Set WATER "Submerzan" monster you control to Attack Position, and if you do, you can change 1 face-up "Submerzan" monster you control to face-down Defense Position. You can reveal 1 Set non-WATER "Submerzan" monster you control; rearrange the face-down Defense Position monsters in your Main Monster Zones, then return them in face-down Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Submerzan Sub-World" once per turn.
1807142.name: Submerzan Sub-World

1816927.effect: You can reveal 1 Set non-WATER "Submerzan" monster you control; rearrange the face-down Defense Position monsters in your Main Monster Zones, then return them in face-down Defense Position. If your opponent's card changes Zones: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Submerzan Sublimation" once per turn.
1816927.name: Submerzan Sublimation

1807185.effect: Reveal 1 Set non-WATER "Submerzan" monster then banish any number of cards from your hand or field; Special Summon "Submerzan" monsters from your Deck up to the number of cards banished to activate this effect in face-down Defense Position. You cannot Summon monsters from your Extra Deck during the turn you activate this card, except for "Submerzan" monsters. You can only activate 1 "Submerzan Submergence" per turn.
1807185.name: Submerzan Submergence

1814821.effect: Change all Set monsters you control to face-up Defense Position, then destroy all monsters you control, except for "Submerzan" monsters. During the End Phase, change as many monsters you control to facedown Defense Position as possible, then draw 1 card. You can only activate 1 "Submerzan Submission" per turn.
1814821.name: Submerzan Submission

1814823.effect: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls and 1 "Submerzan" monster you control; Set those targets. You can only activate 1 "Submerzan Subservience" per turn.
1814823.name: Submerzan Subservience

1814829.effect: If your opponent activates a card or effect while you control a Set monster: Change 1 Set "Submerzan" monster you control to Attack Position, and if you do, negate that activation. You can only activate 1 "Submerzan Subterfuge" per turn.
1814829.name: Submerzan Subterfuge

1814994.effect:
2 Sea Serpent monsters
This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for a Tribute Set. When this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Submerzan" monster from your Deck in face-down Defense Position, but for the rest of this turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except in face-down Defense Position. Once per turn: You can change 1 Set "Submerzan" monster you control to Attack Position; This turn, you can Normal Set 1 monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set (You can only gain this effect once per turn.). You can only use each effect of "Meduzelly, Princess of the Submerzans" once per turn.
1814994.name: Meduzelly, Princess of the Submerzans
